title: Hackterms
description: Hackterms is the urban dictionary for programming terms. I built it and grew it to 1300 definitions from over a thousand contributors.

title: GemFM
description: GemFM is a recommendation engine for great podcast episodes powered by the Spotify and iTunes APIs. Users can rate

title: Tiny Logger
description: TinyLogger is a minimal, distraction-free blogging platform. The minimal interface auto-saves, cleverly hides distractions, and focuses the user on writing.

title: Trakr
description: Named after a heroic 9/11 dog, Trakr is a personal budgeting app. Users can enter and tag expenses, review a monthly dashboard, and see charts and graphs of their spending analytics.

title: MaximPekarsky.com
description: This portfolio is built with server-side rendered React.js, TypeScript, and styled-components
